data.name: HopDodge
data.detailed_description:
Key Features:

Top Down AND 3D platforming
Hop around on the back plane as Hop OR
Jump and weave in the 3D platforming mode as Dodge

30+ Base Levels to play through
Solve puzzles, Avoid traps and obstacles, and explore 50+ different challenging levels

Create and Share your own levels
Using an in-game editor, build levels and contraptions to your heart's desire then share those creations online using Steam Workshop.

Free content updates and features planned
Updates and features are planned for development and will be released as time goes on.
data.about_the_game:
Key Features:

Top Down AND 3D platforming
Hop around on the back plane as Hop OR
Jump and weave in the 3D platforming mode as Dodge

30+ Base Levels to play through
Solve puzzles, Avoid traps and obstacles, and explore 50+ different challenging levels

Create and Share your own levels
Using an in-game editor, build levels and contraptions to your heart's desire then share those creations online using Steam Workshop.

Free content updates and features planned
Updates and features are planned for development and will be released as time goes on.
data.short_description: HopDodge is bringing back classic grid based platforming, with a new twist! Hop around on the back plane, and dodge spikes, wolves, and cannons in the foreground. Every level is built using an ingame editor, so players can create their own limitless content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 12.4
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Works on MacBook Air (2015)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
